text: Hi there
hi!
You seem like someone who likes to help others.
i do! i really try to
The saddest thing are the needy kids out in the world.
i agree. I work in social work so i try to support through job too. do you like to help?
I do like to help.
how do you like to help?
I volunteer for soup kitchens and help out there.
oh that's great! how often?
About once a month.
great! do you know what the deal is with this hit
Yes I do. Do you know about Save the Children charity?
yes i do. what about it
They help children around the world in places like Syria.
yes, so how does that relate to this hit

You can donate to them through this hit. How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment $2.
I prefer to donate my time rather than money, I would not like to donate today, but I do work with children regularly, and I think for me that's more helpful than giving small amounts of money!
Ok that sounds great. But if you do decide to donate some of this payment, the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
OK, good to know. Ya for now I dont want to donate, thanks though!
